name: CCMC Central
description: Coimbatore City Municipal Corporation: The CCMC Central app is an easy and user-friendly citizen-centric service interface.  A one-stop app for citizens of Coimbatore to pay water and property tax and seek redressal of their grievances.  Grievances can be logged about any of the following departments A) Water Resources Department B) Streetlights Department C) Sanitation Department D) Drainage Department E) Roads Department F) Waste Management Department G) Any other department under the purview of CCMC  After registering a grievance, you will be able to  Track Grievances: Track the status of grievances posted by you Provide Feedback: Provide your feedback about the entire experience and we are happy to help you in case you arent satisfied with the solution.  Tax Payment: Water tax Property tax  Features: A. Phone number Authentication B. Online Tax Payment (Water & Property) [Online Banking, Debit Card, Credit Card] C. List of your open and closed complaints D. Auto location picker E. Auto Ward picker F. Real-time status update of your complaint status G. Feedback mechanism to rate the field officer and department and provide valuable feedback for us to improve our service architecture
